sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react'; import { Toast, ToastHeader, ToastBody, Row, Col, Button, Container, Input } from 'reactstrap'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; export default class Calculator extends Component { state = { left: 0, right: 0, operator: 10, iswaiting: false }; addDigit = (digit) =>{ console.log("Adding digit: ",digit); if(this.iswaiting){ //Right const newValue = this.state.right.toString()+digit; this.setState({ right: parseFloat(newValue) }); }else{ //Left const newValue = this.state.left.toString()+digit; this.setState({ left: parseFloat(newValue) }); } } render() { return
} }
